text: Anahate ada sampradaya, sihamte prthiraita ayatha ahankara karaichila arau kaichila, ‘amatakai adhika saktisali arau kona ache’? Eteke sihamte laksya karaa na'i neki ye, niscaya allaha, yijane sihamtaka srsti karaiche, te'om sihamtatakaiyo saktisali? Arau sihamte amara nidarsanaralika asbikara karaichila
